title: The Unforgettable Fifth at Trebizon
description: Long summer days, the Commemoration Ball ... picnics and sailing in Mulberry Cove. The end of the GCSE year looks set to be unforgettable as Rebecca plans her French pen friend's return visit. Bun in a term full of dramatic happenings, nothing could be stranger then the way Emmanuelle behaves. Could everything they have shared really be lost? Rebecca can't believe that, whatever Tish and the others might think ...
author: Anne Digby
